// ==UserScript==
// @name YourBittorrent
// @icon data:image/png;base64,
// @downloadURL yourbittorrent.com
// @connect *://yourbittorrent.com/*
// @trackerURL https://yourbittorrent.com/
// @version 1.0
// @require exKit
// ==/UserScript==

var code = {
  "version": 2,
  "type": "kit",
  "title": "YourBittorrent",
  "icon": "data:image/png;base64,",
  "desc": "",
  "downloadUrl": "yourbittorrent.com",
  "tVersion": "",
  "search": {
    "loginUrl": "",
    "loginFormSelector": "",
    "searchUrl": "https://yourbittorrent.com/?q=%search% ",
    "nextPageSelector": {
      "selector": "#main>div>div:eq(0)>ul>li:eq(4)>a",
      "attr": "href"
    },
    "baseUrl": "https://yourbittorrent.com/",
    "requestType": "GET",
    "listItemSelector": "#main>div>table>tbody>tr",
    "torrentSelector": {
      "title": ">td:eq(0)>div:eq(0)>a",
      "url": {
        "selector": ">td:eq(0)>div:eq(0)>a",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "size": ">td:eq(1)",
      "downloadUrl": {
        "selector": "",
        "attr": "href"
      },
      "seed": ">td:eq(3)",
      "peer": ">td:eq(4)",
      "date": ">td:eq(2)"
    },
    "onGetValue": {
      "size": [
        "convertSize"
      ],
      "date": [
        {
          "name": "timeFormat",
          "format": "1"
        }
      ]
    }
  },
  "uid": 63915093
};

API_exKit(code);
